email.title: Mid-week Digest
email.heading: DoCSoc x CGCU Boat Party

event.text:
Back again for its third year! The CGCU & DoCSoc are proud to present the return of our prestigious collaborative event - the CGCU x DoCSoc Boat Party! Set sail for an unforgettable night of fun, music, and celebration with fellow Engineers - this is one event you won't want to miss!
Tickets are £30, with the main release Friday 28/02/25 @ 19:30 and late release Monday 03/03/25 @ 14:00.
4 drinks tokens and 9x finger food items per person. Black tie dress code.
Sign up [here](https://cgcu.docsoc.co.uk/events/docsocxcgcu/1605439/r/docsocmailshot).

email.text: Every week or so we'll be showcasing a cool student society, project or event. Please email us if you want your cool society/project/event to be featured!
email.heading: LGBTQ+ in Computing x IC Robotics Event

event.text:
🌈🐾 3D Animals Workshop - Flag-Themed Fun! 🐾🌈
Join us for an evening of creativity and community! 🎨✨ LGBTQ+ in Computing are teaming up with IC Robotics for an LGBTQ+ History Month special - come make flag-themed 3D animals! 🏳️‍🌈🐉
Drop in anytime - come late, leave early, it's all chill!
🍪 Light snacks will be provided! 🎉 All skill levels welcome - no prior experience needed!
See you there! 💖

email.heading: CGCU Week
email.text:
Hi everyone,
City and Guilds Week is here, and it's time to show which engineering department reigns supreme! CGCU is hosting an Inter-Departmental Sports Event, and we need YOU to represent Computing.
## Sports:
- Tug of War - 5th March, 17:00-18:00, Queen's Lawn - Football - 8th March, 12:00-16:20, Imperial Sports Ground, Harlington
- Rugby - 9th March, 12:00-16:20, Imperial Sports Ground, Harlington
This is your chance to compete, connect, and bring glory to your department. Whether you're a seasoned player, or just up for some fun, everyone's welcome.
## How to join:
Sign up here: https://forms.office.com/e/01ScdJULhJ.
Want to play multiple sports? Fill out the form again for each one.
## What to bring:
Your own water bottle (we'll provide snacks, food, and non-alcoholic drinks), team spirit and energy!
## Travel Information:
For Harlington, you can either make your own way or join the group travel organised by CGCU:
### 8th March (Football):
- South Kensington Station (Piccadilly Line Westbound): Meet at 11:00 AM - Hammersmith Station (Piccadilly Line Westbound): Meet at 11:15 AM
### 9th March (Rugby):
- South Kensington Station (Piccadilly Line Westbound): Meet at 11:00 AM - Hammersmith Station (Piccadilly Line Westbound): Meet at 11:15 AM
PS: We're looking for a Rugby Referee! If you're keen, your travel and food costs will be covered.

This will be here, at the bottom of all our digests from now on. Feel free to speak your mind regarding events DoCSoc have been running so far, and also about DoCSoc in general.
Please find the link [here](https://forms.gle/WHU127UYv8dd5zGVA)
Individual survey results will be kept private.
